com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.fieldtext

Class FieldTexts

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.fieldtext.FieldTexts

  • public final class FieldTexts
extends Object

    Utility methods for working with fieldtext.

    The factory methods for creating FieldTextBuilders are included in this class as they share names with instance methods of that class, which could lead to subtle problems accidentally invoking the static methods from an instance.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FieldText MATCHNOTHING
      A fieldtext specifier that won't match any documents.

    • Field Detail

      • MATCHNOTHING

        public static final FieldText MATCHNOTHING
        A fieldtext specifier that won't match any documents. This is useful when implementing boolean logic and an empty initial state is required. It usually isn't necessary to access this field directly.

        See also FieldTextBuilder.isMatchNothing().

    • Method Detail

      • AND

        public static FieldTextBuilder AND(FieldText... fieldTexts)
        Creates a new FieldTextBuilder and appends the specified fieldtext expressions, separated using AND operators. If no arguments are specified then the return value will be an empty FieldTextBuilder, suitable for subsequent AND invocations.
        Parameters:
        fieldTexts - Fieldtext expressions
        Returns:
        A new, empty FieldTextBuilder

      • AND

        public static FieldTextBuilder AND(Iterable<? extends FieldText> fieldTexts)
        Creates a new FieldTextBuilder and appends the specified fieldtext expressions, separated using AND operators. If no arguments are specified then the return value will be an empty FieldTextBuilder, suitable for subsequent AND invocations.
        Parameters:
        fieldTexts - Fieldtext expressions
        Returns:
        A new, empty FieldTextBuilder

      • OR

        public static FieldTextBuilder OR(FieldText... fieldTexts)
        Creates a new FieldTextBuilder and appends the specified fieldtext expressions, separated using OR operators. If no arguments are specified then the return value will be equal to MATCHNOTHING, suitable for subsequent OR invocations.
        Parameters:
        fieldTexts - Fieldtext expressions
        Returns:
        A new FieldTextBuilder, equal to MATCHNOTHING

      • OR

        public static FieldTextBuilder OR(Iterable<? extends FieldText> fieldTexts)
        Creates a new FieldTextBuilder and appends the specified fieldtext expressions, separated using OR operators. If no arguments are specified then the return value will be equal to MATCHNOTHING, suitable for subsequent OR invocations.
        Parameters:
        fieldTexts - Fieldtext expressions
        Returns:
        A new FieldTextBuilder, equal to MATCHNOTHING

      • XOR

        public static FieldTextBuilder XOR(FieldText... fieldTexts)
        Creates a new FieldTextBuilder and appends the specified fieldtext expressions, separated using XOR operators. If no arguments are specified then the return value will be equal to MATCHNOTHING, suitable for subsequent XOR invocations.
        Parameters:
        fieldTexts - Fieldtext expressions
        Returns:
        A new FieldTextBuilder, equal to MATCHNOTHING

      • XOR

        public static FieldTextBuilder XOR(Iterable<? extends FieldText> fieldTexts)
        Creates a new FieldTextBuilder and appends the specified fieldtext expressions, separated using XOR operators. If no arguments are specified then the return value will be equal to MATCHNOTHING, suitable for subsequent XOR invocations.
        Parameters:
        fieldTexts - Fieldtext expressions
        Returns:
        A new FieldTextBuilder, equal to MATCHNOTHING

      • NOT

        public static FieldTextBuilder NOT(FieldText fieldText)
        Wraps the specified fieldtext in a FieldTextBuilder and invokes the NOT operator upon it.
        Parameters:
        fieldText - A fieldtext expression
        Returns:
        A new FieldTextBuilder
